name: DEFCON_Aliens
description:
I'd first like to start with introduction. Hi! I am Keysky, I am an avid gamer, and now currently a game-developer rookie. This happens to be my very first game that I have ever made. Its pretty rough, but I am proud of what I have accomplished with this. I am looking forward to hone my skills and make better games going forward. Thank you for giving my game your valuable time.

The game itself is pretty simple. You jump in, kill shit and keep killing as long as you can. Each kill has a chance to drop one of 3 different weapon types: Assault rifle, Shotgun, Sniper rifle (sniper being my favorite) Each kill gives you additional survival time and you will perish when the timer reaches 0.

___________________________________________________________

MOVEMENT : W A S D ( or directional Keys)

LOOK : Mouse movement (Player will always face towards the mouse)

SHOOT : Left Mouse Click

___________________________________________________________

I hope you enjoy, this rather arcade-y game.

While I have kept the game free for download, any donations towards me would be deeply appreciated, as I make my own 3D assets, textures, and codes and I am trying to turn game developing into my profession, and income does help my life-aspect of things.

If the game happens to do well and I get enough downloads, I plan on adding more maps as well. But for now just one map.

I also look forward to see what you think of the mechanics, style or any other things you wanna discuss about the game.

Again, a deep thank you for giving me and my game(s) you time.
